name: LEFLESH Leather Bag
description: It could be yours. This bag is made by LEFLESH, a former, now nearly impossible to find Milanese line. The line was conceived by Bottega Veneta designers Edward Buchanan and Manuela Morin as a whimsical blending of luxury craftsmanship with quirky, inventive design. This bag features brass hardware and two leathers: a buttery black mixed with a more rugged rust. Heads will turn, guaranteed. size: 14"L x 15"H x 4.25"W color: black/rust material: leather condition: excellent original retail: approx. $559 free US shipping

name: Silk Nanette Lepore Jacket
description: Nanette Lepore designs in her atelier in New York City and enjoys a strong following among editors, style-makers and celebrities including Sharon Stone, Blake Lively, Taylor Swift, and Scarlett Johansson. And you, of course! This jacket is everything you love about Nanette Lepore: a fitted shape combined with fanciful, feminine detailing like puff sleeves and ombre ribbon. Easy to love, hard to resist. size: 6 color: deep blue condition: good (slight puckering visible near both upper arms) material: 100% silk original retail: approx. $298 free US shipping

name: Rocky Mountain Featherbed Co. Down Vest
description: That's right â€” the Dom Perignon of down vests. Rocky Mountain Featherbed Co. was founded in the 1960's and quickly became the outdoor luxury brand. It was one of the first brands to incorporate high-end leather patches and metal closures with rugged body fabrics. This vintage 1970's down vest is a gorgeous piece of work, complete with leather yoke, nylon body, goose down filling, and hidden zip pocket. Let's go glamping! size: 9/10 color: mustard/navy condition: good (small stain on upper left shoulder) material: leather/nylon filling: prime goose down current retail: approx. $549 free US shipping
